content.raw: The --transition-prior-strength adds pseudocounts to the label-label transition matrix. I had originally named the old parameter as --len-prior-strength to distinguish it from --transition-prior-strength, but you're right that doing so breaks old scripts. Shiqi, could you change the argument name back?
content.html: The --transition-prior-strength adds pseudocounts to the label-label transition matrix. I had originally named the old parameter as --len-prior-strength to distinguish it from --transition-prior-strength, but you're right that doing so breaks old scripts. Shiqi, could you change the argument name back?
